mapper.select: SELECT c.crewNo, c.geoCode, c.categoryBigNo, c.categorySmallNo, c.crewName, c.crewIntro, c.crewContent, c.crewMax, c.crewAttend, c.crewStatus, c.crewOriginalImg, c.crewSaveImg, c.crewOriginalBanner, c.crewSaveBanner, c.crewDeadDate, c.createdAt, c.updatedAt, g.geoCity, g.geoDistrict, cb.categoryBigName, cs.categorySmallName FROM crew c LEFT JOIN geo g ON c.geoCode = g.geoCode LEFT JOIN category_big cb ON c.categoryBigNo = cb.categoryBigNo LEFT JOIN category_small cs ON c.categorySmallNo = cs.categorySmallNo WHERE c.crewStatus = 1 ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC LIMIT #{recordPerPage} OFFSET #{startNo}
